Question: Which of the following is the name of a communication standard that is used in mobile phone networks and has the three characteristics described below?(1) All communications are processed with a packet switching scheme.(2) It is possible to use a communication scheme called MIMO that uses multiple antennas.(3) This standard is in the international communication standard 3GPP (3rd Generation Partnership Project).
Which of the following is the network layer utility that can be used to check detailed TCP connection information including the status of the connection?
Which of the following describes a brute force attack aimed at finding the key for symmetric encryption?

Choices.a: A correct key for decoding the information can be obtained when the plaintext is altered by a certain method.
Choices.b: The decoding method detects the inappropriate bits of the encrypted text and estimates the original bits by analyzing the frequency distribution of these bits.
Choices.c: The original text can be estimated by analyzing the general pattern of the information of the encrypted text.
Choices.d: An attempt is made to decipher the ciphertext by trying all possible keys.
